tasks.reset_data: dsquery groups.ds 'delete from groups' ; dsquery people.ds 'delete from people'
tasks.reload_data: deno task reset_data ; deno task import_people_csv ; deno task import groups_csv
tasks.test_dataset: dsquery test.ds 'delete from test' ; deno test --allow-net dataset_test.ts
tasks.build: deno compile --allow-read --allow-net --output bin/cold_ui cold_ui.ts ; deno compile --allow-read --allow-net --output bin/ds_importer ds_importer.ts
tasks.test: deno test options_test.ts ; deno test config_test.ts ; deno test people_test.ts ; deno test groups_test.ts ; deno test vocabularies_test.ts ; deno test cold_ui_test.ts
